AT.name: Castlevania®
AT.description: Dracula entsteigt erneut seinem Grab. Beim nächsten Vollmond wird seine Auferstehung vollkommen sein! Als Vampirjäger Nathan Graves liegt es an dir, das Schloss des Grafen zu erstürmen und deinen Lehrmeister zu retten, bevor Dracula dessen Lebensenergie für seine Rückkehr missbrauchen kann. In diesem ersten Castlevania für den Game Boy Advance musst du monströse Gegner und riesige Bosse besiegen, Erfahrungspunkte sammeln und Spezialfähigkeiten erhalten, die dir Zugang zu neuen Arealen gewähren. Kombiniere Aktions- und Attributkarten, um mehr als 80 einzigartige Zauber zu erschaffen: von der Feuerpeitsche bis hin zum eisigen Blizzard. Genügen deine Peitschenkünste, um Dracula zu bezwingen?

AU.name: Castlevania®
AU.description: Dracula is rising once again. At the full moon, the resurrection will be complete! As vampire slayer Nathan Graves, you must storm Dracula’s castle in time to save your mentor before his life force is used to restore the Count’s. In this, the first Castlevania for Game Boy Advance, defeat monstrous enemies and giant bosses, and gain experience points and special abilities to help explore new areas. Combine action and attribute cards to create more than 80 unique magic spells; from fire whips to ice blizzards. Can you whip Dracula into shape?

BG.name: Castlevania®
BG.description: Dracula is rising once again. At the full moon, the resurrection will be complete! As vampire slayer Nathan Graves, you must storm Dracula’s castle in time to save your mentor before his life force is used to restore the Count’s. In this, the first Castlevania for Game Boy Advance, defeat monstrous enemies and giant bosses, and gain experience points and special abilities to help explore new areas. Combine action and attribute cards to create more than 80 unique magic spells; from fire whips to ice blizzards. Can you whip Dracula into shape?

BE.name: Castlevania®
BE.description: À la pleine lune, Dracula sera à nouveau ressuscité ! Incarnez Nathan Graves, le chasseur de vampires, et attaquez le château de Dracula pour sauver votre mentor avant que le comte ne lui suce toute son énergie. Dans ce premier Castlevania sur Game Boy Advance, combattez les ennemis monstrueux et les boss géants pour obtenir des points d'expérience et des capacités spéciales qui vous permettront d'accéder à de nouvelles zones. Associez des cartes d'action et des cartes d'attribut pour créer plus de 80 sorts magiques uniques, du fouet enflammé à la tempête glaciale. Parviendrez-vous à renvoyer Dracula dans sa tombe ?

ES.name: Castlevania®
ES.description: Drácula está resucitando de nuevo: cuando llegue la luna llena, ¡ya no habrá nada que hacer! Ponte en la piel del cazavampiros Nathan Graves, irrumpe en el castillo de Drácula y rescata a tu mentor antes de que su fuerza vital se emplee para resucitar al conde. En esta entrega de Castlevania, la primera para Game Boy Advance, debes tumbar a enemigos monstruosos y a jefes gigantes, además de obtener puntos de experiencia y aprender habilidades especiales para poder explorar las zonas desconocidas. Combina las tarjetas de acción y las de atributos para crear más de 80 hechizos, desde latigazos de fuego hasta ventiscas de hielo. ¿Serás capaz de detener a Drácula?

IT.name: Castlevania®
IT.description: Dracula sta per risvegliarsi dalle tenebre! Il rito è già iniziato e si realizzerà con la luna piena. Vesti i panni dell'ammazzavampiri Nathan Graves, prendi d'assalto il castello del conte prima che sia troppo tardi e salva il tuo maestro. Altrimenti la sua energia vitale sarà usata per riportare Dracula nel mondo dei vivi! Nel primo Castlevania in assoluto per Game Boy Advance dovrai affrontare mostruosi nemici e titanici boss per ottenere punti esperienza e abilità speciali utili per esplorare tante aree segrete. Combina carte azione e attributi per lanciare più di 80 incantesimi, dalla frusta infuocata alla bufera di ghiaccio. Riuscirai a rispedire il signore delle tenebre nella sua tomba?

LT.name: Castlevania®
LT.description: Dracula is rising once again. At the full moon, the resurrection will be complete! As vampire slayer Nathan Graves, you must storm Dracula’s castle in time to save your mentor before his life force is used to restore the Count’s. NL.name: Castlevania®
NL.description: Dracula herrijst nogmaals. Als de maan vol is zal zijn wederopstanding voltooid zijn. Als vampierendoder Nathan Graves, moet jij Dracula's kasteel bestormen en je mentor redden voordat zijn levenskracht wordt gebruikt om Graaf Dracula te herstellen. In dit eerste deel van Castlevania voor de Game Boy Advance, moet je monsters en reusachtige bazen verslaan. Verdien ervaringspunten en speciale krachten om nieuwe gebieden te ontdekken. Combineer actie- en attributiekaarten om meer dan 80 unieke magische spreuken te maken. Leer Dracula de klappen van de zweep.

NZ.name: Castlevania®
NZ.description: Dracula is rising once again. At the full moon, the resurrection will be complete! As vampire slayer Nathan Graves, you must storm Dracula’s castle in time to save your mentor before his life force is used to restore the Count’s. In this, the first Castlevania for Game Boy Advance, defeat monstrous enemies and giant bosses, and gain experience points and special abilities to help explore new areas. Combine action and attribute cards to create more than 80 unique magic spells; from fire whips to ice blizzards. Can you whip Dracula into shape?

PL.name: Castlevania®
PL.description: Dracula is rising once again. At the full moon, the resurrection will be complete! As vampire slayer Nathan Graves, you must storm Dracula’s castle in time to save your mentor before his life force is used to restore the Count’s. In this, the first Castlevania for Game Boy Advance, defeat monstrous enemies and giant bosses, and gain experience points and special abilities to help explore new areas. Combine action and attribute cards to create more than 80 unique magic spells; from fire whips to ice blizzards. Can you whip Dracula into shape?

PT.name: Castlevania®
PT.description: Dracula regressa do túmulo uma vez mais. Com a chegada da lua cheia, a sua ressurreição estará completa! Na pele do caçador de vampiros Nathan Graves, invade o castelo de Dracula a tempo de salvar o teu mentor, antes que a sua força vital seja utilizada para ressuscitar o conde. Nesta edição de Castlevania, a primeira para Game Boy Advance, terás de derrotar inimigos monstruosos e bosses gigantescos para obter pontos de experiência e aprender habilidades especiais que te ajudarão a explorar áreas desconhecidas. Combina as cartas de ação com as de atributos para criar mais de 80 feitiços únicos, desde chicotes de fogo a tempestades de gelo. Serás capaz de deter a tenebrosa ascensão de Dracula?

RU.name: Castlevania®
RU.description: Dracula не желает покидать этот мир! Он вновь собирается воскреснуть, и произойдет это в полнолуние. Охотник на вампиров Nathan Graves должен обыскать мрачный замок графа и спасти своего наставника, иначе Dracula похитит его жизненные силы, чтобы окончательно воскреснуть! В первом эпизоде Castlevania для Game Boy Advance главный герой сражается с легендарными чудовищами и гигантскими боссами, набирает очки опыта и овладевает особыми навыками, чтобы исследовать новые уровни. Совмещайте карты действия (action cards) и магического эффекта (attribute cards), чтобы получить более 80 уникальных заклинаний — от «Огненного кнута» до «Ледяного вихря». Спешите, луна уже растет...
